mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (id, pw, name, phone, address, email, gender, sns, birth, addressDetail, postcode) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{sns}, #{birth}, #{addressDetail}, #{postcode})
mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, phone, address, email, gender, sns, birth, addressDetail, postcode FROM customer WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw} AND ismem = 'Y'
